Translated_Text: You're afraid to pull up the net, aren't you?
I always bathe in this river.
I said (to myself), “Kaywerye evidently doesn't like me”.
I almost go (but I am not going to go).
“Did s/he leave?”, I say to him.
Orig_Translated_Text: '¿Será que se fue? le dije a él.'

Translated_Text: Then I was already grown up.

Primary_Text: onɨ wyaro nkekonɨ bɨryekomo, tɨyonɨ wya
Analyzed_Word: onɨ	wjaro	n-ka-jakonɨ	bɨrʲekomo	tɨ-jonɨ	wja
Translated_Text: This is what the boy said to his mother.
Pass my greetings to your children.
Do you think it is gonna rain?
